info.+content: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Movie: Mugen Train
DEMON SLAYER - KIMETSU NO YAIBA - O FILME: COMBOIO INFINITO
DEMON SLAYER -KIMETSU NO YAIBA- LE FILM : LE TRAIN DE L'INFINI
Demon Slayer – Mugen Train: O Filme
Demon Slayer: The Movie - Il treno Mugen
Guardianes de la noche: La película - Tren infinito
Истребитель демонов: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Фильм: Поезд «Бесконечный»
鬼滅の刃 無限列車編
鬼滅之刃劇場版 無限列車篇

Tanjiro and his team are assigned by the Demon Slayer Corps to accompany Hashira member Kyojuro Rengoku and investigate a string of disappearances aboard the Mugen train. Once aboard, the Demon Slayers fall into the trap of Enmu, a member of the Twelve Kizuki, who forces a group of children to kill them from within their dream realms.
